Class EllipseChartObject

Namespace
FinScript.Rendering.ChartObjects
Assembly
FinScript.Core.dll

An ellipse chart object defined by two (Time, Value) diagonal points

[PublicAPI]
public class EllipseChartObject : Base2PointsShapeChartObject, IScriptUnit, INameDescriptionProvider, INameProvider, IPropertyDisplayInfoProvider, ICloneable, IScriptEnvironmentAssigner, IChartElement, IChartRenderable, IZOrderAssigner, IChartHitTestable, IBackgroundProvider, IStrokeProvider, IPixelOffsetProvider, ITwoPointsProvider

Methods

Create(IComplexChartElement, string, DateTime, double, DateTime, double, bool, Stroke, Color?)

Creates a chart object of type EllipseChartObject or returns an existing object with the specified name

public static EllipseChartObject Create(IComplexChartElement owner, string name, DateTime time1, double value1, DateTime time2, double value2, bool isAutoScale, Stroke stroke, Color? backColor = null)

Parameters

owner IComplexChartElement
name string

A unique name of the object in owner scopes

time1 DateTime

Min X value

value1 double

Min Y value

time2 DateTime

Max X value

value2 double

Max Y value

isAutoScale bool
stroke Stroke
backColor Color?

Returns

EllipseChartObject

Remarks

The ellipse is defined by bounding rectangle (Time1,Value1) - (Time2,Value2)

If mouse cursor hits the shape of chart element, this method returns result, otherwise null

HitTest(double)

If vertical line positioned in xCoordinate crosses the shape of chart element, this method returns collection with all intersections
